newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Leisurenet ends talks on food interests.
newsitem.headline: Leisurenet ends talks on food interests.

text.p: South African health, education and foods group, Leisurenet Ltd, said on Friday it had terminated talks on the possible sale of its food interests.
The group gave no further details in a brief cautionary announcement.
Leisurenet said on April 18 it was involved in talks on the possible sale.
Local reports at the time said the firm was planning to sell off its food franchising interests in a bid to sharpen focus on its core health and fitness divisions.
Business Report, quoting a market source, said a Malaysian-backed firm, NKH, was interested in the group's Foodgro division.
